attributes.action: a new indoor skatepark in nuneaton,warwickshire....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
....as the skateparks in nuneaton are pretty crap to be honest.The jubilee is not a good place for beginners to learn as there are to many townies hang around there.There is also one in camp hill and all that is a crappy 6ft qtr.pipe and again townies hang around there and you can feel intimerdated by them.So can you please sign this!This includes everyone!
p.s. this is for a good cause so young skaters and bmxers can learn without feeling threatened.So please, please sign this!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
